name: Shahrzad - The Storyteller
description: Shahrzad - The Storyteller is a stunningly beautiful hidden object game with over 60 puzzles and minigames. Let the world of 1001 Persian nights mystify you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windiows 7 or higher Processor: 2 GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VGA with 512MB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space Sound Card: recommended
